name: affine line with doubled $\NN$

proofs.locally-noetherian: Every copy of $\AA^1_\QQ$ is locally noetherian.

description: The affine line over $\QQ$ with all points in $\NN$ doubled. It can be constructed as follows. For any $n \in \NN$ let $X_n = \AA^1_\QQ$, and let $X_{ij} = X_i \setminus \{ i, j \}$ for all $i, j \in \NN$. The transition maps $\varphi_{ij} : X_{ij} \to X_{ji}$ are the identity maps, obviously satisfying the cocycle conditions. The scheme is obtained by gluing.
